plain: The user's favourite genre is war fiction. The user's favourite kind of plot is anti-war. The user's favourite setting is World War I. The user's favourite writing style is stream-of-consciousness. The user's favourite length is short. The user's favourite topic is the futility of war. The user's favourite pacing is slow. The user's favourite narrative structure is first-person. The user's favourite themes are pacifism and the horrors of war.
